#summary Compatibility of tarlog-plugins.

= Compatibility =

== Version 1.4.2 ==

The 1.4.2 was tested and found working with the following Eclipse versions:
 
 * Eclipse 4.2 RC3
 * Eclipse 3.7
 * Eclipse 3.6
 * Eclipse 3.5

All the test were done on Windows OS.
Since 2011 I'm running Eclipse mostly on Windows Vista both 32 and 64 bit.
